On Sat, 19 Jun 2004, Ron Besser wrote:

> Sorry for this question. I'm not a UNIX programmer, just a chemical researcher. In trying to do the installation of Cantera for Windows XP, I'm trying to run configure from the cygwin command line and I get "configure: command not found." I know I have reached the directory where the cantera install files (including the configure files) are. Also, the basic unix command ls doesn't work. I'm know I'm doing something very basic incorrectly. Help!
>
> Thanks,
> Ron Besser
